overview: Only true friendship can live through a revolution, witness a war, and survive exile. This documentary is about a cultural icon (Googoosh) and her friendship with a legendary singer (Martik). Both banned and exiled, yet still on stage, and still at their peak. The story of how Friendship made a nation of immigrants feel at home.
tagline: Only true friendship can live through a revolution, witness a war, and survive exile.
title: FRIENDSHIP THE DOCUMENTARY
